Anayo Modestus Onyekwere  (amụrụ nwoke'a na ụbọchị mbụ nke Mach n'afọ 1962 na Mbaise, Imo State, Nigeria )   Anayo, onye nke amara amara dịka Kanayo O Kanayo bụ onye Nigeria na-eme ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2006, ọ meriri ma nweta nturu ugo nke kacha mma n’egwuregwu Africa Movie Academy Award
Kanayo malitere ime ihe nkiri n'afọ 1992 mgbe oso mee ihe nkiri Living in Bondage
Kanayo emeela ihe nkiri karịrị otu narị
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya United Nations ma nwee ọkwa na aha MFR

Kanayo tinyere Kenneth Nnebue (onye mepụta ihe nkiri Living in Bondage ), Olu Jacobs, Enoch Adeboye, Queen Elizabeth na Fela Kuti so na ndị  ndị gọọmentị Naijirịa kwanyere ùgwù na afọ 2014 n'oge ememme narị afọ
